name: Envirco Incorporated
materials: Aluminum Cans; Glass (Brown); Cardboard; Glass (Clear); Glass (Green); Newspapers; Office Paper; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes:
This site is located at the Moorefield Industrial Park.    Recycling Drop Off Schedule
This service is provided for Envirco, Inc. Customers only.
All location times are 9:00am to 12:00pm, Call (304) 897-6060 and talk to Stephanie Snapp, Office Mgr

Location Day 
Wardensville War Memorial Building 1st Saturday of Each Month 
Moorefield Industrial Park 3rd Saturday of Each Month 
Mathias Community Center 4th Saturday of Each Month 
Grant County Customers Call Office for Arrangements 

Acceptable Items (All Items Must Be Clean)  
Paper, Aluminum, Glass: Clear & Brown, Cardboard, Cans, Bottles, Newspapers, Foil, Jars, Scrap paper, Scrap Magazines, Books, Paper Board
